short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Cash Flow Calculator Chrome Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Calculate cash flow for rental properties in seconds.

Simple Cash Flow Calculator helps you calculate cash flow while you browse the web. No leaving the browser, complex formulas or messy spreadsheets. Just add the extension to Chrome and calculate cash flow for rental properties in seconds.

How it works
➤ When you visit a Real Estate website (Redfin, Zillow, Realtor.com etc.), scroll to the monthly payment and add the number to the ‘PITI’ section in the extension. Next, add the rental income.  Finally, add the expenses as the percentage of income (start with 25%* and adjust).  Voila! The extension will show you the cash flow for the property. This way, you can make more offers confidently.

*10% for property management, 8% for repairs, 7% for vacancy

Install in seconds
➤ It only takes two clicks to get started

Browse the Real Estate website of your choice
➤ Simple Cash Flow Calculator is not tied to any specific website

Calculate cash flow in seconds
➤ It's simply a matter of adding three numbers and you're done. You don’t even have to click a ‘Calculate’ button since the extension automatically calculates for you.

Make more offers faster
➤ Focus on what's most important: making offers fast and with confidence!

Declutter your Real Estate Investing
➤ Just one minimalist and well-designed extension that is one click away to replace all your messy spreadsheets.
